saints_subtitle_quote: "Due as the honey-bee goes from flower to flower, so should the wisdom-seeker go from saint to Saint."
saints_description: This collection features the lives and teachings of great saints, spiritual masters, and realized souls from various spiritual traditions. These are individuals who have dedicated their lives to spiritual practice, service, and the guidance of seekers on the path of enlightenment. By studying their lives, we gain inspiration and practical wisdom for our own spiritual journey.
saints_more_saints_text: This collection includes 64+ saints in total, featuring spiritual masters from various traditions and eras. For a complete list and detailed biographies, please visit the original trust website or download our books.
saints_category_ancient_desc: Revered masters from ancient spiritual traditions.
saints_category_medieval_desc: Spiritual masters from the medieval period.
saints_category_modern_desc: Contemporary spiritual masters and realized souls.
saint_akkalkota_desc: A holy saint of the Dattatreya tradition known for his ascetic power and guidance.
saint_sripada_desc: The divine incarnation regarded as the first avatar of Lord Dattatreya.
saint_narasimha_desc: A revered master known for spiritual wisdom and divine grace.
saint_tajuddin_desc: A Sufi saint known for his love and compassion.
saint_gajanan_desc: A great saint known for his miraculous spiritual guidance.
saint_narayana_desc: A spiritual master revered for his teachings and divine wisdom.
saint_dhuniwala_desc: A saint known for his ascetic life and wisdom grace.
saint_manikya_desc: A great master known for his divine teachings and grace.
saint_ramakrishna_desc: A great saint of Bengal known for his spiritual realization.
about_title: Welcome to Sai Master Seva Trust
about_p1: The Sri Sai Master Seva Trust, located in Golagamudi, Nellore District, Andhra Pradesh, is dedicated to upholding the spiritual values of Satyam (Truth), Dharmam (Righteousness), Sampannatvam (Prosperity), Sadharanativam (Simplicity), and Sadgurutva (Service to the Guru).
about_p2: Founded on the teachings of Sri Peeda Subrahmaiah (affectionately known as STP), the Trust continues to serve as a beacon for devotees seeking spiritual guidance. Even after His MahaSamadhi in 2007, the divine guidance continues through the Trust, protecting and guiding devotees on the righteous path inspired by the Dattatreya Sampradaya and the teachings of great Mahatmas who have preceded STP.
about_p3: We are committed to spreading spiritual wisdom through books, publications, discourses, and preserving the rich legacy of teachings on truth, dharma, and self-realization.
about_disclaimer_text: We are NOT organized or connected with "Bhagavan Sri Venkayya Swami-Ashramam (or) Temples". All activities of this website are connected with "Sri Sai Master Seva Trust, Golagamudi" only.
about_value1_desc: Upholding truth and righteous conduct in all our endeavors
about_value2_desc: The path of service with a focus on simple, humble living
about_value3_desc: Protecting and guiding devotees on their spiritual journey
books_subtitle: Books are available for purchase at Sai Master Seva Trust, Colagamudi. Check the list and books by prof.
satsang_subtitle: Satsang refers to spiritual discourses in the company of truth-seekers. These audio recordings contain teachings on spiritual practice, the path of Guru Seva (service to the Guru), and methods for inner transformation and self realization.
satsang_description: Each discourse is designed to guide devotees on their spiritual journey, addressing practical challenges and providing wisdom from the Dattatreya Sampradaya tradition.
contact_subtitle: We are here to help you on your spiritual journey.
contact_visit_address: Golagamudi, Nellore District, Andhra Pradesh, India
footer_about_desc: Sri Sai Master Seva Trust is dedicated to spreading spiritual wisdom and serving devotees on their spiritual journey.
footer_address: Golagamudi, Nellore District, Andhra Pradesh, India
